channel.title: Is a usb-c to ethernet adapter okay in physical isolation build?
channel.description:
I am interested in physical isolation and I am going to try and experiment with it.
I have a desktop with ethernet and wifi and a laptop with wifi. I believe the documentation says both computers need to have ethernet.
Is it acceptable to use a usb-c to ethernet adapter for my laptop?
Thank you in advance.

item.title: Is a usb-c to ethernet adapter okay in physical isolation build?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
If you can make it work, that is OK.

Read full topic
item.source: Is a usb-c to ethernet adapter okay in physical isolation build?
